Attacks are 20% more effectives.

objects.name: texttankexplain
objects.string:
Tank has 300 hp instead 100.
Tank can craft only somes heals 
           and dps powers.

objects.name: texthealexplain
objects.string:
Heals are 20% more effectives.
Healer can craft only heals powers.
